page.title: 15Penny's Days 4
page.content: Got up at 8 a.m. to get ready for church. I had cornflakes and a cup of tea for breakfast. Went to chuch at 9.20 a.m. where I sing in the choir. I went to Sunday School at 10.45 a.m. For lunch I had a packet of gammon flavoured crisps,a jam sandwich and a drink of an apple and blackberry drink. After lunch I played out with Sharon Greer at cards, 'Run,Rabbit,Run,'and 'Stay Alive.'Then we played on bikes with Michael Hazelwood. When Michael went in Mrs. Wooly gave Sharon and I a merangue each, they were lovely because they had cream in the middle.She asked us if we had any jam-jars because if we did we could have some cinder toffee that she had made.
